name: tailwind-plugin-device
description: TailwindCSS plugin to add variants for input device detection using `@media` queries
author: Nick K.

scripts.build: microbundle build --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --target node --format es,cjs --generateTypes false && tsc --project tsconfig.d.ts.json && del-cli lib/entries.d.ts lib/variants.d.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run cleanup && npm run build
